name: Flygon
author: BERUBURI
flavor_text: Known as “The Desert Spirit,” this Pokémon hides in the sandstorms it causes by beating its wings.

abilities.name: Sand Slammer
abilities.effect: At any time between turns, if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent’s Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flying Beatdown
attacks.effect: You may discard a {G} Energy and a {F} Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
